name: Peg Perego Viaggio Shuttle - Booster Car Seat - for Children from 40 to 120 lbs - Made in Italy - Licorice (Black)
short_description: Innovative microfiber fabric on seat is breathable and absorbs moisture — keeping the child cool and comfortable.
Imported
Made In Italy. Holds up to 120 lbs with a maximum height of 63 inches
Has an integrated Rigid latch which makes it easy to place in car and keeps booster secure when child is not present
The integrated rigid latch can slide back into the booster, allowing it to easily be used in vehicles without latch
Integrated rigid latch contains our exclusive Blind Lock System, which protects the seat from inadvertent release
Cup holder included
product_description: Growing children will get a boost in safety with the Viaggio Shuttle. An Integrated Rigid latch system allows for the Shuttle to connect to the vehicle latch anchors for perfect placement. If a vehicle does not have anchors, the Integrated Rigid latch can be pushed back into the booster, making it simple to use in any vehicle. A cup holder is included for quick drink access during rides. The cushion of the Viaggio Shuttle includes a super layer of soft urethane foam, keeping bottoms comfortable on long journeys. The Viaggio Shuttle comes equipped with a carry handle and adjustable shoulder clip, making it easy to use while on the go. Make safety a priority for growing children with the Viaggio Shuttle.

name: BubbleBum Teleport Backless Booster Car Seat, Kids Booster Seat for Car 40-100 lbs, Telescopic Portable Carseat, Ideal for Everyday Use and Foldable for Travel, 4 Year Old + Child/Toddler - Black
short_description: EVERYDAY BOOSTER THAT TRAVELS – Rigid, durable car booster seat for daily use, same weight as a traditional kids booster car seat with the added advantage of folding to become a portable car seat.

USA BABY SAFETY ALLIANCE CERTIFIED – TelePort car seat booster is tested to FMVSS 213 (USA) and R129/04 (EU), the world’s highest standards. Leading the way in child safety booster car seats for the most trusted protection.
3-STEP EASY SETUP – 1) Push button to extend seat, 2) Raise red belt guides and secure, 3) attach the abdominal shield low on buckle end of the vehicle seat belt.

PACKS SMALL, CARRIES EASY – Telescopic design compacts down with a shoulder strap for easy transport—perfect travel booster seat for trips, taxis, school runs, carpooling and switching between vehicles.

SMART DESIGN, EASY CLEAN – A sleek slim booster seat that compacts down to 40% of its size, transforming into a portable car seat. Features a padded seat for comfort, non-slip base for stability, and a removable, machine-washable cover for cleanliness.

name: 3-Pack Seat Belt Buckle Booster (BPA Free) - Raises Your Seat Belt for Easy Access - Stop Fishing for Buried Seat Belts - Makes Receptacle Stand Upright for No-Hassle Buckling (3)
short_description: Non-toxic, BPA-Free, Food-Grade, Silicone / TPE / TPU
Imported

CHECK YOUR SEAT BELT BUCKLE BEFORE ORDERING: Please review the images that show where the Buckle Booster will fit and make sure your seat belt buckle is not too recessed. Also note that the inner dimensions are 1.93 inches x 1.06 inches and the material stretches a bit. No matter what, we'll still help with your order, but reviewing in advance is always best.

NO MORE FRUSTRATION WITH SEAT BELTS - Do you get annoyed with buried seat belt buckles? It's a hassle digging receptacles from under the seat. Your solution is the Buckle Booster. It slips around your receptacle in seconds to ensure that your seat belt buckle doesn't get buried. Keeping your receptacle upright and accessible for future rides, this adult and kid-friendly tool makes buckling a breeze.

RAISES YOUR RECEPTACLE - The trouble with buckling is not just inadequate space, it's also how far you have to reach for the buckle. The Buckle Booster elevates your seat belt receptacle so the metal tongue can click in smoothy and effortlessly. No more strain and struggle - buckle yourself and others quickly and without hassle!

PERFECT FOR KIDS AND ADULTS - The BPA-free Buckle Booster allows you to buckle up with just one hand, whether you are in a hurry or have mobility challenges. Are you post-surgery, have arthritis or simply unable to spare a hand for buckling? The Buckle Booster lets you buckle yourself and others with one hand. Keeping the receptacle stable, you just need to click the metal tongue in and you're ready to go!

IDEAL BETWEEN BOOSTER AND CAR SEATS - Reaching from the side to buckle babies and kids can be frustrating due to the elusive, floppy buckles that get buried under seats. With three car or booster seats in the back, your buckling job is nearly impossible. With the Buckle Booster, made from safe materials, buckling loved ones in the back is easy! You can comfortably reach the receptacle, even between car and booster seats. Have one car seat? Reaching the stable, elevated buckle just got easy!
product_details: Material Composition ‎Non-toxic, BPA-Free, Food-Grade, Silicone / TPE / TPU

short_description: 8 Years One Booster - for your big kid from 40 - 120 lb. It's all you will ever need.
Easy-adjust enhanced and improved 7-position headrest that grows up with your child. Engineered for safety and comfort with 2 layers of Side Impact Protection.
Built for comfort for every size - our XL wide design is optimized for comfort and safety with built-in padded armrests and finished with deep padded cushioning.
Two built-in retractable 2-in-1 cup holder and snack tray - keeps your big kid's drink close at hand and stows away their essentials.
Our contoured premium soft fabrics - with layered foam padding that provide comfort and support can be easily removed for machine washing.
Open loop belt guides - easy access to seatbelt buckle help your big kid with self buckling - don't forget to check though!

product_description: Cambria 2XT High Back to Backless XL Booster Seat: designed in 5 new exclusive fabrics to bring vibrance to your back seat. Suitable from 40 - 120 lb, expect up to 8 years of safety from just one booster seat. The Cambria 2XT includes an improved 7-position headrest to provide protective head support for your child with side impact protection. The ergonomic car seat base has been designed for complete child comfort and features 2x 2-in-1 fold-away cup holders and storage compartments to accommodate all your little one's cups, toys, and more on the move. Integrated LATCH connectors and front adjusters allow you to quickly tighten the booster car seat to the vehicle seat. The bright and bold covers allow your little one to arrive in style, with easy remove covers constructed from practical fabrics that can be machine washed and/or wiped clean. When they are ready, the Cambria 2XT transforms from a high-back booster to a backless booster seat offering two seats in one. So, whether youre taking them to school, on a playdate with a friend, or an overnight visit with grandparents, Cambria 2XT will always provide a comfortable and safe journey.

name: Chicco KidFit ClearTex Plus 2-in-1 Belt-Positioning Booster Car Seat, Backless and High Back Booster Seat, for Children Aged 4 Years and up and 40-100 lbs. | Obsidian/Black
short_description: [N/A]
HEAD AND TORSO PROTECTION – Superior DuoGuard for head and body support and 10-position height adjustment from the waist instead of the neck offer reassuring protection and child comfort.

GRAB & GO CONVENIENCE – Equipped with premium LATCH connectors and a SuperCinch one-pull tightener to stabilize the seat and the quick-release LATCH provides one-hand removal for easy transfer creating an ideal portable booster seat.
FLAME RETARDANT-FREE – ClearTex materials feature no flame retardant chemicals and meet federal flammability standards. All fabrics, including armrests, are removable and machine washable.

COMFORT AND CONVENIENCE – A contoured ErgoBoost seat with double foam padding provides comfort and support in all the right places. Two dishwasher-safe CupFolders fold out of the way when empty for a narrow booster seat.

BUILT TO GROW – As a high back booster seat, the 2-position recline backrest adjusts to mimic the vehicle seat position. For older children, the backrest is removeable to create a backless booster seat.
product_description: High Back to Backless Booster: Designed to Grow The IIHS Best Bet KidFit ClearTex Plus Booster Seat is designed with 10 positions of DuoGuard protection, plus quick-release LATCH for easy removal and no flame retardant chemicals. The easy-adjust headrest ensures proper belt positioning and integrated side wings offer two layers of protection for head and body support with a rigid shell and EPS energy-absorbing foam. Secure Attachment PLUS Quick Removal The KidFit ClearTex Plus is equipped with premium LATCH connectors and a SuperCinch one-pull tightener to stabilize the seat and keep it secured when unoccupied. The quick-release LATCH provides convenient, one-hand removal to easily transfer between vehicles for an ideal travel booster seat. Built for Comfort The contoured ErgoBoost seat with double foam padding provides comfort and support in all the right places, and a 2-position backrest adjusts to mimic the vehicle seat position. The backrest is also removable to create a backless booster for older children. ClearTex products meet federal car safety flammability standards without the need of flame retardant chemicals. GREENGUARD Gold Certified, the KidFit ClearTex Plus booster seat has been tested for low chemical emissions, contributing to healthier air quality. For additional parent convenience, all fabrics, including armrest covers, are removable and machine washable. Two dishwasher-safe CupFolders fold out of the way when empty for a narrow booster seat and are easy to remove for cleaning. KidFit ClearTex Plus is designed for children at least 4 years of age who can sit relatively still in the same seated position throughout the car ride, 44-57 inches tall and between 40-100 lbs. in high back booster seat mode or 40-110 lbs. in backless booster seat mode.
